title: Notification bar on Pixel 4 XL disappearing
content:
So whenever I take my phone off the Pixel Stand I notice this problem. Can't see the notification bar or time or date or nothing. Can't swipe down even, nothing. All it takes seemingly is a restart or power off and then on to fix this but I don't wanna keep doing that. This is very frustrating. Any help anyone can suggest?

Regardless, this issue has happened to me a few times too and I've noticed it happens when I take my phone only off the Pixel Stand. So I personally think it's something to do with how the phone is configured with the Pixel Stand in the latest update.

I saw another user post another thread on here about this but comments were closed I wanna draw attention to this issue. Google conveniently closed all of their phone lines so they can't help. Pretty lousy on Google's part and that's I guess what happens when they have no offices, their PAYING customers now have to go to community forums for help??? This is hugely disappointing as a consistent paying Google customer.
